title: Synthetic approach to iodosulfuron-methyl and metsulfuron-methyl metabolites and their application for water analysis
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15848-15855
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01725K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Marcin Rakowiecki, Sylwia Studzińska, Jacek Ścianowski, Mariusz J. Bosiak, Andrzej Wolan, Marcin Budny
Synthesis of iodosulfuron-methyl and metsulfuron-methyl metabolites and their application for water sample analysis from the Vistula river are reported.
